Description:
Personal Qualities/SkillsExcellent English verbal and written communication skills, including ability to provide verbal and written summaries and rationale to a diverse audience. 
Excellent interpersonal skills and able to work effectively as a member of a team. 
Management skills needed to initiate, develop, implement and evaluate complex, multiple projects from inception to completion.
Excellent ability to exercise sound independent judgment and effectively manage time and resources with minimal supervision. Excellent organizational skills.
Have knowledge of quality improvement principles as well as assessment techniques.
Have appreciation of cultural diversity and sensitivity towards target population.EducationNursingJob Details
